mapper.insert: insert into comments values( SEQ_COMMENT.nextval, #{com_content}, sysdate, #{one_no, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pro_qna_no, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{re_no, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{commu_no, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{eco_no, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ets_no, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{member_no}, #{cer_no, jdbcType=INTEGER} )
mapper.select: select c.no,TO_CHAR(com_regdate,'yyyy/mm/dd')com_regdate, nickname, com_content,member_no from comments c, member m where c.member_no=m.no and commu_no=#{no}
select c.no, TO_CHAR(com_regdate,'yyyy/mm/dd')com_regdate,nickname, com_content,member_no from member m, comments c where m.no=c.member_no and cer_no=#{cer_no}

mapper.delete: delete comments where no=#{no} and member_no=#{member_no}
mapper.update: update comments set com_content=#{com_content} where member_no=#{member_no} and no=#{no}
mapper.select: select ROWNUM num , c.no, nickname, c.com_content ,to_char(com_regdate,'yyyy/mm/dd')com_regdate,member_no from comments c, member m where member_no=#{no} and m.no = c.member_no order by com_regdate
